comments:
I20051213-0010

From bug 120570.

Create a file p/A.B.java with contents:
package p;
public class A { }

-> The quick fix 'Rename type to A.B' fails, because 'A.B' is not a valid
identifier. It should check if the compilation unit name is a valid type name.
